name: Dot Plot
description: Dot Plot intended for Upstream Kinase Analysis results

properties.name: ColorLowerLimit
properties.description: Lower limit for the color scale of the dots

properties.name: ColorUpperLimit
properties.description: Upper limit for the color scale of the dots

properties.name: SizeLowerLimit
properties.description: Lower limit for the size scale of the dots

properties.name: SizeUpperLimit
properties.description: Upper limit for the size scale of the dots

properties.name: Layout
properties.description: Layout of the panels in the dotplot

properties.name: PlotSize
properties.description: Long side length of the plot
